00019    /* 
00020    * Constructor.
00021    */
00022    CosineSqAngle::CosineSqAngle()
00023     : nAngleType_(0)
00024    {
00025       for (int i = 0; i < MaxNAngleType; ++i) {
00026          kappa_[i]     = 0.0;
00027          theta0_[i]    = 0.0;
00028          cosTheta0_[i] = 1.0;
00029       }
00030    }
00031 
00032    /* 
00033    * Copy constructor.
00034    */
00035    CosineSqAngle::CosineSqAngle(const CosineSqAngle& other)
00036     : nAngleType_(other.nAngleType_)
00037    {
00038       for (int i = 0; i < MaxNAngleType; ++i) {
00039          kappa_[i]     = other.kappa_[i];
00040          theta0_[i]    = other.theta0_[i];
00041          cosTheta0_[i] = other.cosTheta0_[i];
00042       }
00043    }
00044 
00045    /* 
00046    * Assignment.
00047    */
00048    CosineSqAngle& CosineSqAngle::operator = (const CosineSqAngle& other)
00049    {
00050       nAngleType_ = other.nAngleType_;
00051       for (int i = 0; i < MaxNAngleType; ++i) {
00052          kappa_[i]     = other.kappa_[i];
00053          theta0_[i]    = other.theta0_[i];
00054          cosTheta0_[i] = other.cosTheta0_[i];
00055       }
00056       return *this;
00057    }
00058 
00059    /* 
00060    * Set the nAngleType_ member.
00061    */
00062    void CosineSqAngle::setNAngleType(int nAngleType)
00063    {  
00064       if (nAngleType > MaxNAngleType) {
00065          UTIL_THROW("nAngleType > CosineSqAngle::MaxNAngleType");
00066       }
00067       nAngleType_ = nAngleType;
00068    }
00069 
00070    /* 
00071    * Read bend interaction parameters kappa from file.
00072    */
00073    void CosineSqAngle::readParam(std::istream &in) 
00074    {
00075       // Preconditions
00076       if (nAngleType_ <= 0) {
00077          UTIL_THROW("nAngleType must be set before readParam");
00078       }
00079 
00080       // Read parameters
00081       //readBegin(in, "CosineSqAngle");
00082       readCArray<double>(in, "kappa",  kappa_,  nAngleType_);
00083       readCArray<double>(in, "theta0", theta0_, nAngleType_);
00084 
00085       // Convert from degrees to radians.
00086       for (int i = 0; i < nAngleType_; ++i) {
00087          cosTheta0_[i] = cos(theta0_[i] / 180.0 * Constants::Pi);
00088       }
00089 
00090       //readEnd(in);
00091    }
00092 
00093    /*
00094    * Modify a parameter, identified by a string.
00095    */
00096    void CosineSqAngle::set(std::string name, int type, double value)
00097    {
00098       if (name == "kappa") {
00099          kappa_[type] = value;
00100       } else
00101       if (name == "theta0") {
00102          theta0_[type] = value;
00103       } else {
00104          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00105       }
00106    }
00107 
00108    /*
00109    * Get a parameter value, identified by a string.
00110    */
00111    double CosineSqAngle::get(std::string name, int type) const
00112    {
00113       double value = 0.0;
00114       if (name == "kappa") {
00115          value = kappa_[type];
00116       } else
00117       if (name == "theta0") {
00118          value = theta0_[type];
00119       } else {
00120          UTIL_THROW("Unrecognized parameter name");
00121       }
00122       return value;
00123    }

00128    std::string CosineSqAngle::className() const
